Description:
Verify that items from the personal toolbar folder are properly
      added/deleted.

Verify that double-clicking on a bookmark causes it to be launched in
      a browser window
Verify that there are no 'dead' default links.
Verify that several bookmarks are deleted at one time.

* Longer range:
      there is discussion about introducing Internet permission zones.
      Some of the settings shown here may be controlled by such zones
      (Waiting for Implementation)

Verify that when you encounter a Web site that could be prefilled,
      that you are given the pre-fill dialog and when you click cancel,
      the information is not filled into the form.

Feature: Edit Form Data - new value for field
Description:
Verify that if you add a new value for a field in Form Manager
      it is later offered as an option when prefilling a form using
      this field.
Verify correct recently visited sites are in go menu.

Verify that the process to replace a forgotten master password is
      easier/more discoverable (though encrypted information should still be
      lost to the user who has forgotten their password).

Verify that when you have designated not to ever save a username and
      password in password manager, this information can be viewed in the
      password manager through preferences (expedia.com)
Determine if a page with indentations prints as seen on screen
Verify list of available local panels
Verify that changes reflect immediately from Bookmarks Manager
Verify that adding of a panel using javascript works
Verify that component buttons work and behave as appropriate.
